description: Using ifttt one can ask alice to find his phone. sets the ring tone at max volume and initiates a call on it.

intents.name: FindPhone
utterances: do you know where i left my phone
do you know where my phone is
do you know where the mobile of {Patrick:=>Who} is
try to find my phone please
please try to find my phone
could you try to locate {Emily:=>Who}'s phone
please help me find my phone
i don't know where i left my phone
i need help finding the phone of {John:=>Who}
can you please locate my phone
